Investment Sales

Driving value by competently pricing assets and negotiating for competitive execution

Overview

At SAB Capital, we are experts in structuring bespoke sale-leaseback solutions for companies of all sizes, both investment and sub-investment grade, public and private, and across multiple industries.

We provide sound investing advice and tailored client solutions focused on sale-leaseback financing, debt and equity placements, and asset acquisitions.

Through our services, we help clients finance new acquisitions, fund growth initiatives, and reinvest capital in their core business activities.

Our Process

  • 01

    Pre-Launch

    Develop first class offering memoradum with professional mapping and aerial photography to position asset and highlight best attributes.

  • 02

    Launch

    Bring to market and provide measurable results in a 180 day process-thorough and in-depth marketing reports tracking buyer activity.

  • 03

    Campaign

    Five round marketing process - targeted call campaign, hard mail campaign, email blasts, advertisements, broker engagement, etc.

  • 04

    1031 Capital

    Corralling of 1031 capital - work together with our multi family agents to exclusively manage their clients 1031 exchanges.

  • 05

    Execution

    Transaction management - enforce timelines and encourage communication between all parties of the transaction.

  • 06

    Execution

    Transaction management - enforce timelines and encourage communication between all parties of the transaction.
